attributes.additional_details: Please support the continuation of Bradford Free City Bus. A service that is supporting a dwindling shopping area in a previously prosperous City. Companies like Westfield have let us down, making false promises about a new shopping centre. Our City is dying, companies are moving out to Leeds or going bust. A few bus service is a life line to many people across a multi cultrial city

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
